item.title: Call of Duty 4 Video I made
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“error.login, post:8, topic:179464”][quote author=ThugLife link=topic=240641.msg2040452#msg2040452 date=1202539659]

i have tried pc one and there all dumb on it, the 360 is much more fun to get kills on

Where’d you get that from? :S.
Anyway i get plenty of melee kills on ps3 which is pretty much the same as xbox 360. I really need to get the pc version
[/quote]
well the controls are easyer and imo its harder to get knife kills.[/quote]

how are ps3 controls easier then 360 controls?
